name: Lukas Böhres
title: B. Sc.
cv: Lukas Böhres is a student research assistant since April 2018 funded by the DFG Initiative of Excellence. Together with Frederic Kerksieck he is responsible for programming the CSS-Lab Tools as well as the CSS-Lab Website. After successfully completing the Bachelor's program of Computer Science at RWTH Aachen University, he is currently enrolled in the follow-up Master's program. His work at the chair is focused on developing and maintaining software solutions to be engaged in the research field of Computational Science Studies. His Bachelor thesis was presented to the chair of Computer Animation of RWTH Aachen University in 2018 and holds the title "Optimization Integrator for Hair Simulation".
